title: True Dutch Auction:  T212-1 Ort and Ragan
author: mybuddyinc

posts.post_title: True Dutch Auction:  T212-1 Ort and Ragan
posts.post_content:
Frank's recent "BST auction" gave me an idea:  Let's try a True Dutch Auction --- I will start these cards at a price, and lower that price 5% per day, until someone buys them (just email me when you want to buy).  This daily reduction will probably occur early afternoon (EDT :)), but that may vary.  Final price will include s/h/i, and paypal, check, or mo accepted.

This should be straight forward ;), but will see as we go :confused:

T212-1 -- Ort -- SGC 40

Starting price on other thread:  $200 -- didn't sell.
5-30-09:  $190 -- didn't sell.
5-31-09:  $180.50  -- didn't sell (&^%#$, should have accecpted $190 offero on ebay, oh well)
6-1-09:  $171.48 -- didn't sell.
6-2-09:  $162.91

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=979&d=1243707848[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=980&d=1243707866[/IMG]



T212-1 -- Ragan -- SGC 40
Starting price on other thread:  $225 -- didn't sell.
5-30-09:  $213.75 -- didn't sell.
5-31-09:  $203.06 -- didn't sell.
6-1-09:  192.91 -- didn't sell.
6-2-09:  $183.26



[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=981&d=1243707879[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=982&d=1243707893[/IMG]




Man, this might come back and bite me in the a$$ :eek:, but I will NOT stop until sold.


Fun, Fun, Scott

6-2-09 -- 5% price drop:

Ort -- $162.91
Ragan -- $183.26

Fun, fun ............... [url=http://www.freesmileys.org][img]http://www.freesmileys.org/smileys/smiley-shocked028.gif[/img][/url]
Let me end the madness.  I'll take them, Scott.

Anthony,
They're yours.

Thank you, tomorrow's smiley was going to be ............. [url=http://www.freesmileys.org][img]http://www.freesmileys.org/smileys/smiley-shocked035.gif[/img][/url]
